title: Video of people shopping without social distancing norms in Pakistan is shared as the one from various cities in India
subtitle: A video of people shopping with no social distancing at a shopping bazaar in Pakistan is shared as that from various cities in India.
author: factly.in
vclaim:
A video of people shopping with no social distancing is being shared widely on social media with a claim that it was taken at a shopping centre in Chandni Chowk (Delhi). The same video is also being shared as that of a shopping centre at Mohammed Ali Road in Mumbai (archived) and also at New Market in Kolkata (archived). FACTLY has found the video was taken at a shopping bazaar in Pakistan, not in any city of India. The video was taken at New Anarkali Bazaar in Faisalabad (Pakistan). So, the video has nothing to do with India. Earlier, when the same video went viral as that of a shopping centre in Old city (Hyderabad), FACTLY has debunked the claim and written a fact-check which can be read here.

Did you watch our new video?
